name: Lolita Creator
description:
Want to create your own lolita? Now you can with the lolita creator! Choose from tons of cute outfits and hairstyles to create your cute lolita character!

Features


  • 7 Cute Dresses
  • 3 Pretty Hairstyles
  • 17 Beautiful Accessories (Headbands and handheld accessories)
  • 8 Different facial expressions
  • Saving your character as a transparent .PNG image
